title: ALL SOLD - 14 T206 for sale individually + discount for larger purchases

posts.post_title: ALL SOLD - 14 T206 for sale individually + discount for larger purchases
posts.post_content:
I have the 12 T206 for sale as seen below (2 have been sold).  They are priced individually.  Shipping is $3.00 for either 1 or 2 cards, free shipping on 3 cards or more.  Buy 5 cards or more and get 10% off, or all 12 remaining cards for $175.00 (16% off).  I will respond to all pm's in order of receipt late this evening.

Brian
